DOC.brief_summary: To test whether investigator 's educational methodology associate increase learning participant . The investigator second objective test hypothesis learn online classroom would result similar outcome traditional classroom .
DOC.brief_title: Online Distance Learning Outcomes Compared Traditional Classroom Learning Medicine
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects randomize `` control '' group attend traditional classroom `` trial '' group equal number participate online synchronous Internet streaming classroom . Main outcome measure : Pre post multiple choice examination Vestibulo-Ocular Reflex ( VOR ) , Movement , Head Turns , Head Tremor , Neurodegeneration , Inferior Olivary Complex , Collateral Projections , Eye Movement Training , Visual Saccades , Head Saccades , Visual Impairment , Walking Speed , Neuroprotection , Autophagy , Hyperkinetic Movement , Eye Head Stability , Oscilllatory Head Movements , Gaze Stability , Leaky Neural Integrator , Cervical Dystonia , Interstitial Nucleus Cajal ( INC ) Head Tilts , Visual Pursuits , Optokinetic Stimulation , Vestibular Rehabilitation . Methods : All candidate take pretest examination subject material . Two 9-hour one 8-hour session 3 consecutive day give live classroom synchronously online classroom use Adobe Connect e-learning platform . Subjects randomize online classroom attend lecture location choice view session live Internet . A posttest examination give candidate completion course .
DOC.criteria: Licensed Health Care Professional , Active Practice Non Licensed Health Care Professional , Non Active Practice
